titles.title: We Shall See the King Some Day

verse.name: v1
c
verse.lines: We shall see the King some day, We will shout and sing some day; Gathered ’round the throne, When He shall call His own, We shall see the King some day.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: After pain and anguish, after toil and care, We shall see the King some day; Thro' the endless ages joy and blessing share, We shall see the King some day.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: After foes are conquered, after battles won, We shall see the King some day; After strife is over, after set of sun, We shall see the King some day.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: There with all the loved ones who have gone before, We shall see the King some day; Sorrow past forever, on that peaceful shore, We shall see the King some day.
